entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-10-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • False positive IDE0059 for variable captured by lambda in switch block #57344
  • Endless loop in 'Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.ChildSyntaxList.ItemInternal(SyntaxNode, int)' #57343
  • Roslyn projects failing to build in source-build bootstrap build #57342

Closed

  • CS8604 Null reference false positive with two nullable objects #57320

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix the assembly name used in generator identity #57341
    Area-IDE
  • Fix exception being thrown if the list of files didn't change #57340
    Area-IDE
  • [LSP] Fix races in tests for LspWorkspaceManager by waiting for workspace operations on creation #57339
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #57332
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Needs UX Triage, Next
  • List patterns: main IDE scenarios and AddRequiredParens #53850
    Area-IDE, New Feature - List Patterns, 17.1
  • Add VSTypeScriptAsynchronousTaggerProvider #57310
    Area-IDE, Next

Updated

  • Binder.CreateConversion - Report use-site diagnostics for the entire conversion hierarchy. #57175
    Area-Compilers
  • Address some PROTOTYPE markers #57318
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - List Patterns
  • [hackathon] Support nice syntax for ValueArray in most type contexts. #57286
    Area-Compilers
  • Remove the BranchId concept from teh workspace #57132
    Area-IDE
  • Allow newlines in the holes inside interpolated strings #56853
    Area-Compilers, Compiler.Next
  • Options5 #57254
    Area-IDE, Needs UX Triage
  • features/list-patterns #54864
    PR For Personal Review Only
  • Compute val escape for extended property patterns #57211
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Extended Property Patterns
